description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to eat virtually anything, from inanimate objects to living beings, and assimilate consumed items into their body or fuse multiple consumed objects to create new things.

abilities.description: The user can stretch their mouth to enormous sizes and consume massive objects or multiple items at once.
The user can incorporate eaten objects into their body, such as transforming consumed cannons into arm cannons or eating weapons to use their properties.
The user can eat multiple objects and fuse them together to create entirely new items through the Baku Baku Factory ability.

weaknesses.description: The user experiences constant, insatiable hunger as a side effect of the fruit's power.
Rubber and other chewy materials are difficult for the user to swallow.
User cannot swim and is weakened by Seastone and standing water.

keyMoments.title: Baku Baku no Mi First Demonstration
keyMoments.description: Wapol demonstrates the fruit's power by eating part of the Going Merry's railing, showing his ability to consume anything.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of the Baku Baku no Mi's consumption abilities.

keyMoments.title: Wapol Eats Cannons
keyMoments.description: Wapol consumes cannons to prepare to use them as weapons, demonstrating the fruit's ability to assimilate objects.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the versatility of the Baku Baku no Mi's powers.

trivia.fact: The Baku Baku no Mi is named after 'baku baku,' the Japanese onomatopoeia for eating or munching sounds.
In Japanese mythology, a Baku is a dream-eating creature, though Wapol's fruit allows him to eat physical objects rather than dreams.
